mapper.select: select e.evaluate ,e.create_time,e.evaluate_id , e.user_id,u.user_name,u.user_image from item_commodity_evaluate e left join user_info u on u.uid=e.user_id where commodity_id=#{commodityId} and e.status = 0 and u.status = 0 LIMIT #{page}, #{limit}
select count(*) from item_commodity_evaluate where commodity_id=#{commodityId} and status = 0

select u.user_image,u.user_name,u.uid,e.evaluate,e.evaluate_id,e.create_time from user_info u join item_commodity_evaluate e on u.uid = e.user_id where u.uid in ( select user_id from item_commodity_evaluate where item_id = #{itemId} and status = 0 ) LIMIT #{page}, #{limit}
select count(*) from user_info u join item_commodity_evaluate e on u.uid = e.user_id where u.uid in ( select user_id from item_commodity_evaluate where item_id = #{itemId} )
